[[inst_lwu]]
==== LWU

*Syntax:* lwu [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}><<<shamt>], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Load 32-bit word from memory.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_lwu.svg[LWU encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/BASE_REG
